mapper.insert: INSERT INTO altservice.comtnemplyrinfo (EMPLYR_ID, USER_NM, PASSWORD, SEXDSTN_CODE, HOUSE_ADRES, PASSWORD_HINT, PASSWORD_CNSR, HOUSE_END_TELNO, AREA_NO, DETAIL_ADRES, ZIP, EMAIL_ADRES, HOUSE_MIDDLE_TELNO, MOBLPHON_NO, EMPLYR_STTUS_CODE, SBSCRB_DE, DELETE_AT, EMPL_NO) VALUES (#{emplyr_id}, #{user_nm}, #{password}, #{sexdstn_code}, #{house_adres}, #{password_hint}, #{password_cnsr}, #{house_end_telno}, #{area_no}, #{detail_adres}, #{zip}, #{email_adres}, #{house_middle_telno}, #{moblphon_no}, 'r', now(), 'n', (SELECT COALESCE(COUNT(*) + 1,1) as empl_no FROM altservice.comtnemplyrinfo c) )
mapper.select:
SELECT @RNUM:=@RNUM-1 AS list_no, c.EMPLYR_ID, c.ORGNZT_ID, c.USER_NM, c.EMAIL_ADRES, c.AREA_NO, c.HOUSE_MIDDLE_TELNO, c.HOUSE_END_TELNO, IF(c.EMPLYR_STTUS_CODE = 'a', '승인', IF(c.EMPLYR_STTUS_CODE = 'r', '신청','')) AS emplyr_sttus_code, c.SBSCRB_DE, c.MOBLPHON_NO FROM (SELECT @RNUM:=(SELECT COUNT(*) - #{offset} + 1 FROM altservice.comtnemplyrinfo WHERE DELETE_AT = 'n' )) r, altservice.comtnemplyrinfo c WHERE DELETE_AT = 'n'
ORDER BY c.sbscrb_de DESC, c.empl_no DESC LIMIT #{perPageNum} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM altservice.comtnemplyrinfo WHERE DELETE_AT = 'n'
mapper.update: UPDATE altservice.comtnemplyrinfo SET user_nm = #{user_nm}, sexdstn_code = #{sexdstn_code}, area_no = #{area_no}, house_middle_telno = #{house_middle_telno}, house_end_telno = #{house_end_telno}, email_adres = #{email_adres}, detail_adres = #{detail_adres}, emplyr_sttus_code = #{emplyr_sttus_code} WHERE emplyr_id = #{emplyr_id}
